name: portnote
tagline: A self-hosted encrypted note and password manager
description: PortNote is a self-hosted password manager with note encryption. It stores sensitive notes securely via browser with categories, search, and a clean UI for personal use.

features.title: End-to-End Encryption
features.description: Store sensitive notes and passwords with client-side encryption for maximum security

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Quickly find notes and passwords using full-text search across all entries

features.title: Password Generation
features.description: Generate strong, random passwords with customizable length and character requirements

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Export notes and passwords for backup or migration to other systems

features.title: Clean Interface
features.description: Minimal, distraction-free UI focuses on quick note access and password retrieval

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Create separate accounts for different users with isolated encrypted storage
